text: Angelique Kerber (born 18 January 1988 in Bremen, Germany) is a professional tennis player from Germany.Kerber's profile at WTA Retrieved 12 August 2018 She is three time Grand Slam champion, having won Australian Open and U S Open in 2016 and Wimbledon in 2018.Angelique Kerber stuns Serena Williams to clinch Australian Open title Retrieved 12 August 2018Bundesliga stars hail Angelique Kerber Retrieved 12 August 2018 In September, 2016, Kerber became the oldest female player to hold world no. 1 ranking for the first time.Kerber — oldest to debut at World No.1 Retrieved 12 August 2018 She also won silver medal at 2016 Summer Olympics while representing Germany.Angelique Kerber wins silver at Olympics Retrieved 12 August 2018 == Career statistics == ===Singles Grand Slam
